channel.title: Keyboard issues
channel.description: Okay the purple plug keyboards they're old but its all i have but the plug on my mother board broke and i had an adapter which made the purple plug into usb now the keyboard has some delay if I try and hold the "w" button in my game it lags i guess and i cant use "Ctrl" + "W" in the game and when i switch from "w" to "s" to go back it delays then it starts to go then stops i have to hold it for 3 secs before it actually goes, Before the keyboard was perfectly fine. is there anything i can do to fix this?

item.title: Keyboard issues
item.dc:creator: @RUNE-PK RUNE-PK
item.description:
@RUNE-PK wrote:

[quote=“Spades, post:2, topic:550854”]Why don’t you just buy a new keyboard?

And the purple thing is a PS2

You can get a keyboard for like 3 bucks at monoprice.

But try restarting your computer and see if that fixes it, and make sure the connection is secure.[/quote]

I could buy a new one but the shipping xD but you know i like to do things the hard way lol and the ps2 port on my computer is broken i dropped my keyboard allot

Read full topic

item.title: Keyboard issues
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

Why don’t you just buy a new keyboard?

And the purple thing is a PS2

You can get a keyboard for like 3 bucks at monoprice.

But try restarting your computer and see if that fixes it, and make sure the connection is secure.

Read full topic

item.title: Keyboard issues
item.dc:creator: @RUNE-PK RUNE-PK
item.description:
@RUNE-PK wrote:

Okay the purple plug keyboards they’re old but its all i have but the plug on my mother board broke and i had an adapter which made the purple plug into usb now the keyboard has some delay if I try and hold the “w” button in my game it lags i guess and i cant use “Ctrl” + “W” in the game and when i switch from “w” to “s” to go back it delays then it starts to go then stops i have to hold it for 3 secs before it actually goes, Before the keyboard was perfectly fine. is there anything i can do to fix this?
